title: The Void Awakens
content: The darkness stirred. A whisper crossed the threshold. We weren’t alone anymore.

title: Zergling Sightings
content: Small claws scuttling in the dark. No sound. Just shadows.

title: Flash Memory Fragment 3
content: A figure looms in the haze, like an echo of something once known.

title: Flash Memory Fragment 4
content: The door cracked open, but the light on the other side was darker.

title: The Sealed Entity
content: We thought we sealed it. We thought it would stay buried, but it didn't.

title: Note to Self: Burn the Books
content: Forget. Forget everything. Burn it all.

title: The Black Hole
content: A hollow scream echoed from the depths. The hole was growing. We couldn’t escape.

title: Zergling Territory
content: Nests in every corner. Waiting. Watching.

title: Flash Memory Fragment 5
content: The storm rolled in, but something else followed. A shadow of pure hunger.

title: The Sealed Box
content: The box was never meant to be opened. Yet, we still did it. And now we pay the price.

title: The Laws of Non-Euclidean Time
content: In the equation, the variable X was missing. It wasn't lost, it was **never there**. The clock rotated backwards, but the hands remained fixed, as if **time itself forgot**. According to the formula, we should never have existed at all. Yet, here we are, trapped in the paradox of two plus two **equaling seven**. The numbers don’t lie, but they don’t explain either. The law says this cannot happen. But we happen, don’t we?

title: Ghost Watch
content:
Ghost Watch
I bought a watch—
not smart, just time.
No buzz, no map,
no glass to shine.
Just ticking hands,
a sun-worn band,
a way to say:
I understand.
Last night, washed clean
and almost dressed,
I left it sitting
on the chest.
Out I went,
my wrist all pale—
a quiet gap,
a silent fail.
I looked, I looked,
that empty glance—
a phantom twitch
in every dance.
No phone, no weight
to track or ping—
I lost it too.
Didn’t feel a thing.
But all night long
one thought would notch:
not for the phone—
I missed my watch.

title: Xenobiological Report: Zergling
content:
**Scientific Designation:** *Therozoa serrata*
**Common Name:** Zerg
**Environmental Habitat:** Native to the sulfuric highland basins of Draxion Theta, characterized by superheated basalt plains, acidic rainfall, and methane-rich, low-oxygen atmospheres.
**Core Biological Structure:** Hybrid exoskeletal-crystalline structure with chitin-silicate armor and piezoelectric lattice cores. Capable of limited self-repair via embedded nanocrystalline regrowth.
**Blood Composition:** Cobalt-blue vanadium-rich ichor. Vanadocytes enable oxidative bursts for movement and energy conversion.
**Metabolism:** Dual-phase metabolic system. Anaerobic glycolysis for baseline activity; chemotropic vanadate burst for rapid acceleration and combat.
**Reproduction:** Thermophilic external budding near geothermal vents. Spore-like airborne gametocytes fertilize a resin matrix. Maturation in under 36 hours.
**Evolutionary Traits:** Acid- and heat-resistant exoskeleton, pheromone-reactive neurology, vertical traversal via adhesive hooks. Crystalline resonance nodes may serve communication functions.
**Hive Behavior:** No individual sapience. Displays decentralized swarm intelligence, likely mediated via semiochemicals or quantum resonance. Highly coordinated attack patterns suggest distributed cognition akin to slime molds or ant colonies.
**Conclusion:** *Therozoa serrata* exhibits high environmental adaptability and threat potential. Swarm behavior and metabolic surges pose unique challenges to containment and observation. Further study recommended.
